body.p: To his Excellency the Govenor of Kentucky

The undersigned would respectfully State and represent That J. W. Hutchinson was tried and found guilty of the crime of manslaughter at the October term of the Todd Circuit Court for 1863 and he has since that time been confined in the Penitentiary of the State under the judgment of the court, and that for several years previous to the time, that Hutchinson killed G. B. McGuir they were enimies and McGuir beat Hutchinson Several times previous to the time he killed him He was evidently afraid of McGuir but the jury view of the opinion that Hutchinson at the time killed McGuir under the law and ^evidence^ was not at that particular time justifiable in killing him under the circumstances we the Citizens of Todd County would respectfully ask his release.
